Text: Thanks for posting the first motos. I am surprised more people arent downloading them. They were all begging me for them.

I'm not posting on any forums, maybe they just don't know.
Thanks for your work too, it's the only way for me to watch the amazing us riders.
Thanks for uploading this, but I'm sorry to say that it's almost unwatchable. The frame freezes up like every 10th second. Any chance of a re-rip making it work better?
I've made another version through Safari, and freezes disappear. I post this version soon.
